parameter.name: DefaultConnection-Web.config Connection String
parameter.description: DefaultConnection Connection String used in web.config by the application to access the database.
parameter.defaultValue: Data Source=bmart.database.windows.net; Initial Catalog=BMartDB; User name=bmartadmin; Password=Bmartpassword123; MultipleActiveResultSets=True;

parameter.name: BMart.Models.ApplicationDbContext-Web.config Connection String
parameter.description: BMart.Models.ApplicationDbContext Connection String used in web.config by the application to access the database.
